definition: a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]

sentences.english: I must be in town next Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我下星期六一定要进城去。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱们暂时不要考虑，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: This coupon isn't good for Saturdays and Sundays.
sentences.chinese: 这张联票不能用于星期六和星期日。

sentences.english: We hope to shorten the distance after Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 我们希望在星期六之后能缩短距离。

sentences.english: This Saturday is my birthday and I'm goingto hold a party in my house.
sentences.chinese: 这个星期六是我的生日，我要在我家举办一个聚会。

sentences.english: France are playing against Wales on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 星期六法国队迎战威尔士队。

sentences.english: Would you like to go cycling with me on the Road Around The Island on Saturday?
sentences.chinese: 星期六你愿意和我一起去环岛路骑自行车吗？

sentences.english: The bloom is set to wilt late Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 花将会在星期六晚些时候或星期天凋谢。

sentences.english: Every Saturday since then, I have taken one marble out and thrown it away.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，每到星期六，我都拿出一个弹珠扔掉。

sentences.english: We are planning to take a long hike on Saturday. Are you up for it?
sentences.chinese: 星期六我们计划来次很长的徒步旅行。要去吗？

sentences.english: Go all out with a lace dress and vampy lipstick for a Saturday night out.
sentences.chinese: 星期六晚上，穿上花边礼服，涂上vampy口红。

sentences.english: As of noon on Saturday, the water had risen to within 20 meters of the mine opening.
sentences.chinese: 截至星期六中午，水位已上升到距矿井口约20米处。

sentences.english: You are cordially invited to a reception to be given in our ministry on Saturday evening.
sentences.chinese: 诚恳邀请参加我部本星期六晚间举行的招待会。

sentences.english: The measures goes into effect on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 这些措施从星期六开始生效。

sentences.english: What do people usually do on Saturday night?
sentences.chinese: 人们通常在星期六晚上做什么？

sentences.english: Saturday and Sunday would not be included in those interval calculations.
sentences.chinese: 星期六和星期日不包括在这个时间间隔计算中。
